data.text: @betman4711 Hi, I kindly ask you to delete your booking number from this public message and please send us a DM with your booking and contact details if your booking was made directly via Finnair, in other cases please contact the travel agency. //Mari

@emma_pople Hi, I would recommend that you call the travel agency directly in order to receive some further information regarding your refund. //Mari

The partnership ensures that our customers are provided a test certificate required by the destination country smoothly and in a timely manner: As our customer, you will get access to the testing service at a discounted price and a possibility to buy it with Finnair Plus points.

data.text: @HjalmarPalmgren We do follow laws concerning air passengers' rights. Unfortunately we cannot comment on your case more closely here on social media. -Sara
@HjalmarPalmgren We appreciate all the feedback we receive from our customers. We are sorry to hear that you are disappointed with claim handling. -Sara
RT @jarimakinen: Nice to see that the next #A350 for @Finnair will fly soon to Helsinki. It’s already an old friend: I’ve seen it two times…

OH-LWR will soon start her journey towards HEL. She was supposed to arrive already this spring, but we were able to delay the delivery. She will now join the rest of our fleet that is mostly parked and waiting for better times. May they arrive soon! https://t.co/5m0P1XeOgE
@GokulKrishnaSr1 Great to hear that, welcome on board again soon!
@sheedabp Hi! Could you please DM us your booking reference, passenger name(s) and route so I'll take a look? //Anu

urls.title: The sisu within you: The Finnish key to life, love and success - thisisFINLAND
urls.description: Finnish sisu is so simple and straightforward that sometimes it takes a whole book to explain it.

data.text: Tough, unpredictable times call for sisu. In Finland, we have a concept of sisu. Read more about what is sisu: https://t.co/bkysoViQy0. #sisu #InThisTogether https://t.co/E9MHGis7Kz
@Okahkonen Hei, 2019 noin 40% asiakkaistamme koko verkostossa lähti liikkeelle Suomesta, eli oli lähtökohtaisesti todennäköisesti Suomen kansalaisia. Heidi / Finnair
@Flip_Stewart Glad we were able to help and free your afternoon! Welcome onboard again at a better time. Heidi / Finnair
"If you want to see the sunshine, you have to weather the storm" 🌩️⚡️ https://t.co/7KHtoHo1sp
@markKeranen Hi! Unfortunately, the refund handling times have been very long. Could you please DM us with booking reference, flight dates and passenger name(s) so I'll take a look?

@karilappalainen @valtionomistus Finnair ei ole saanut yritystukea valtiolta. Valtio on taannut Finnairille 600M€ lainan 90-prosenttisesti ja osallistui 500M€ osakeantiin. Finnairin johdon palkkioita on jo leikattu. Oman pääoman vahvistaminen on tärkeää, että voimme tulevaisuudessa taata yhteydet maailmalle.

Finnair starts co-operation negotiations on plans to reduce 1 000 jobs due to COVID-19 impacts and travel restrictions. Long-term temporary layoffs will also continue for thousands of Finnair employees. https://t.co/NEZlJELPnD

We have finalised a sale and leaseback agreement for one of its A350 aircraft. The immediate positive cash effect for Finnair is in excess of 100 million euros. Read more: https://t.co/UuYaNxqegP https://t.co/sPsslvhpTC

✈️ In Finland, travel adds €16 billion to the economy, which is more than the forestry industry
